I know one person who claims to have been cured at Dolukanda. He was a good person. lived according to Buddhist principals but did not have excessive faith in rituals. It was years after when people asked how his neck pain was cured, he said. " just after the Priest stopped chanting pirith I took off my neck support and never wore it" I have great faith in pirith- Buddha's own words (mostly) -the perfect truth about life and how it should be lived.
